pages.title: Storage Interface
pages.text: A $(thing)remote access point$() into a Functional Storage network. Place anywhere and link to a Storage Controller to query items remotely — no need to be next to the controller.$(br2)Peripheral type: $(thing)"storage_interface"$()$(br2)$(bold)Requires:$() The $(thing)Functional Storage$() mod (fxntstorage) must be installed. LogicLink auto-detects its presence and registers the peripheral only when the mod is loaded.$(br2)This attaches to an existing $(thing)Storage Interface$() block from Functional Storage.

pages.title: How to Use
pages.text: $(bold)Setup:$()$(br)$(li)Build a Functional Storage network with a Controller$(br)$(li)Place a Functional Storage Interface block linked to the network$(br)$(li)Place a CC:Tweaked computer next to the Interface$(br)$(li)Wrap: $(#4488CC)peripheral.find("storage_interface")$()$(br2)$(bold)Connection Methods:$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)isConnected()$() → boolean$(br)  True if linked to a controller$(br)$(li)$(thing)getPosition()$() → {x, y, z}$(br)  Position of the interface block$(br)$(li)$(thing)getControllerPosition()$() → {x, y, z} or nil$(br)  Position of the linked controller$(br)$(li)$(thing)getBoxCount()$() → int$(br)  Number of boxes in the linked network

pages.title: Inventory Queries
pages.text: $(li)$(thing)size()$() → int$(br)  Total slot count in linked network$(br)$(li)$(thing)getItemCount(itemId)$() → int$(br)  Count of specific item by registry ID$(br2)$(bold)list()$() → {slot → item}$(br)1-based slots, empty slots omitted.$(br)$(bold)Fields:$() $(thing)name$(), $(thing)displayName$(), $(thing)count$(), $(thing)maxCount$()$(br2)$(bold)getItemDetail(slot)$() → table or nil$(br)Detailed info for one 1-based slot.$(br)$(bold)Fields:$() $(thing)name$(), $(thing)displayName$(), $(thing)count$(), $(thing)maxCount$(), $(thing)maxStackSize$(), $(thing)tags$() (list of tag IDs)

pages.title: Search & Summary
pages.text: $(bold)getItemSummary()$() → list of unique items$(br)$(bold)Fields:$() $(thing)name$(), $(thing)displayName$(), $(thing)count$() (total), $(thing)boxes$() (box count)$(br2)$(bold)findItems(query)$() → list of matching items$(br)Case-insensitive partial match. Throws if query is empty.$(br)$(bold)Fields:$() $(thing)name$(), $(thing)displayName$(), $(thing)count$(), $(thing)maxCount$(), $(thing)slot$()$(br2)$(#4488CC)local si = peripheral.find("storage_interface")$(br)if si.isConnected() then$(br)  for _, item in ipairs(si.findItems("diamond")) do$(br)    print(item.displayName.." x"..item.count)$(br)  end$(br)end$()

pages.title: vs. Storage Controller
pages.text: The Interface provides a $(thing)read-only subset$() of the Storage Controller's methods. It does $(bold)not$() have:$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTotalItemCount()$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)getTotalCapacity()$()$(br)$(li)$(thing)getBoxes()$() — detailed box data$(br)$(li)$(thing)pushItems()$() — item transfer$(br)$(li)$(thing)pullItems()$()$(br2)Use the Interface for $(bold)remote monitoring$() — checking stock levels, searching items, displaying inventory on distant screens.$(br2)Use the Controller directly when you need $(bold)full access$() — box details, capacity tracking, or item transfers.$(br2)$(#4488CC)-- Remote warehouse monitor$(br)local si = peripheral.find("storage_interface")$(br)local ctrl = si.getControllerPosition()$(br)print("Controller at: "..ctrl.x..","..ctrl.y..","..ctrl.z)$()
